2fa-template.title: Two-factor authentication
2fa-template.line2: To ensure the security of your account, you must enter this verification code when you log in.
2fa-template.line3: This code is only valid for <bold>5 minutes</bold>, please enter it as soon as possible.
2fa-template.line4: If you did not request this verification code, please ignore this email.
